appeal-form__error--once.message: Oops! To help cover fees, the minimum one-time contribution amount is $5.

appeal-form__error--monthly.message: Oops! To help cover fees, the minimum monthly contribution amount is $1.99.

appeal-form__error--yearly.message: Oops! To help cover fees, the minimum yearly contribution amount is $5.

stripe-sorry.message: Sorry, your payment could not be processed.

not-supported.message: Sorry, this card type is not accepted currently.

what-is-included-1-year.message: Nice! A $20 contribution gets Adblock Plus Premium for one year. Thanks for your support.

what-is-included-x-years.message: Nice! A contribution gets Adblock Plus Premium for years. Thanks for your support.

what-is-included-x-months.message: Nice! A contribution gets Adblock Plus Premium for months. Thanks for your support.

what-is-included-monthly.message: Nice! A monthly contribution gets Adblock Plus Premium. Thanks for your support.

what-is-included-yearly.message: Nice! A yearly contribution gets Adblock Plus Premium. Thanks for your support.
